CustomField.inlineHelpText: The check mark indicates that the activity has been completed. All unchecked items must be completed to the close the case.
CustomField.label: The check mark indicates the activity

value.fullName: No Client have an open legal custody record of committed to Dss, Guardianship to Dss, Delinquency voluntary Placement Agreement, Shelter Care or Committed to Another State.
value.label: No Client have an open legal custody record of committed to Dss, Guardianship to Dss, Delinquency voluntary Placement Agreement, Shelter Care or Committed to Another State.

value.fullName: A SAFE or SAFE-C OHR has been completed for all applicable children and the assessment has supervisory approval
value.label: A SAFE or SAFE-C OHR has been completed for all applicable children and the assessment has supervisory approval

value.fullName: There are no incomplete MFRA's or MFIRA's pending supervisor approval
value.label: There are no incomplete MFRA's or MFIRA's pending supervisor approval

value.fullName: All Safety Plans have Supervisory Approval(id appicable)
value.label: All Safety Plans have Supervisory Approval(id appicable)
